title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 4.1 - In general
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 4.1 - In general

State Regulations

Hearings will be held in cases where required by law and in
such other cases as the commission may direct. Evidentiary hearings shall be
governed by the provisions of this Part, except as otherwise specifically
provided in this Title. Legislative-type hearings shall be conducted in
accordance with such procedures as the commission may direct. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
4.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
